about.title: About
about.disclaimer: This project is not affiliated with Rotaeno or its developers. All rights are reserved to their respective owners.
about.initial_data: Initial data comes from "Rotaeno 次世代Rating分析表for rotaeno ver2.3.0" by Team Rhythematics. A friend sent me this and I didn't found any public link via Google so there's currently missing link. Feel free to contact me if you have a link that I could attribute to.
about.rating_calculation: Rating calculation is based on the work of Kown & Kiei & Eastown with <1>Rotaeno Rating推分参考公式（B30）(in Chinese)</1>.
about.wiki_data: Songs and charts data are now automatically fetched from the <1>Rotaeno Wiki (in Chinese)</1>.
about.open_source: This project is open source and free to use. Feel free to collaborate on <1>GitHub (GalvinGao/rotaeno-kit)</1>.
